entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
